name: MR. EDUARDO BERNARDI
title:
Business Development Manager - Asia Pacific
LOHMANN BREEDERS
description: Eduardo joined LOHMANN in August 2021 as Business Development Manager for Asia Pacific. A veterinarian with global poultry experience, he has held roles in Brazil, Canada, Germany, Malaysia, and New Zealand. Though new to LOHMANN BREEDERS, he’s no stranger to Cuxhaven or the LOHMANN family. He now lives in Queensland, Australia, with his wife and twin boys.

name: DR. TAKEHIKO HAYAKAWA
title:
Manager, Regional Strategic Product Management
DSM APAC
description: Dr. Takehiko Hayakawa is a poultry nutrition expert with over 20 years of experience, specializing in layer nutrition, vitamin D, and carotenoids. He leads product initiatives for DSM Asia Pacific and helped develop tools like the DSM YolkFan. Co-author of the Illustrated Egg Handbook, he has published 20+ papers and continues to drive innovation in egg quality and nutrition.

name: MR. TOMMY LIM
title:
Product Sales Manager, Climate
Big Dutchman Asia
description: Tommy Lim is the Climate Technical Sales Advisor at Big Dutchman, with over 11 years of experience. He specializes in microclimate control, digital egg flow, data analysis, and model farm digitalization. Tommy designs ventilation systems for major projects across Asia and also serves as Sales Manager for the Indian market, where he drives growth in a rapidly expanding region.

name: DR. EMIL DELA PEÑA
title:
Technical and VTS Lead
Boehringer Ingelheim Philippines
description: Dr. Emil B. de la Peña is a seasoned veterinary professional with over two decades of experience in poultry and livestock health and operations. He earned his Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) degree from the University of the Philippines College of Veterinary Medicine and holds a Master of Business Administration (MBA) from Bulacan State University.
